desc: We're an online and hassle-free storefront based out of New Jersey bringing you the highest quality custom fit affordable grillz in real silver, 10kt and 14kt gold!

layout.text: FREE 3-WAY SHIPPING ON EVERY US ORDER

Every grillz order in the USA includes:
1. Free mold kit shipped to you.
2. Custom mold shipped back to us.
3. Finished custom grillz shipped to you.
